problem.question: To prevent a cutting board from sliding on the counter while chopping, you should:
options: Place a damp towel underneath the cutting board to create friction.
Place a dry paper towel underneath the cutting board to create friction.

key_steps: Sliding occurs when friction is insufficient
Damp towel has adhesive properties and high friction
Water creates temporary bonds between surfaces
Dry paper is slippery and slides easily

constraints.description: Material must provide high friction coefficient

logic_requirements: Compares wet vs dry friction properties
